posts.title: aaa
posts.text: 安装1brew install lrzsz 下载iterm2-zmodem1234git clone https://github.com/aikuyun/iterm2-zmodem.gitcd iterm2-zmodemchmod +x *.shcp -rp *.sh /usr/local/bin/ 配置 iterm2进入iterm2配置项 profiles->default->editProfiles->Advanced中的Tirgger 12345678910Regular expression: rz waiting to receive.\*\*B0100Action: Run Silent CoprocessParameters: /usr/local/bin/iterm2-send-zmodem.shInstant: checked第二条：Regular expression: \*\*B00000000000000Action: Run Silent CoprocessParameters: /usr/local/bin/iterm2-recv-zmodem.shInstant: checked 具体如图

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
